articles.title: Afghanistan Earthquake: Humanitarian Agencies Launch Urgent Aid Appeal
articles.summary: International humanitarian organizations are requesting immediate assistance following a devastating earthquake in eastern Afghanistan on September 3rd. The disaster has caused significant structural damage and casualties, prompting a coordinated emergency response.

articles.title: Global Bond Sell-off Intensifies as Gold Hits Record High
articles.summary: Investors are rapidly selling government bonds worldwide while gold prices reach unprecedented levels. This market shift reflects growing concerns about global economic stability and inflation risks.

articles.title: Trump Appeals to Supreme Court Over Tariff Powers
articles.summary: Former President Trump has petitioned the Supreme Court to review his authority to impose broad tariffs under emergency powers law, following a federal appeals court ruling limiting presidential tariff capabilities.

dailyGreeting: Good morning! Markets shake as gold soars to records.
